title: Video: Outfit – Two Islands
body:
Liverpool’s **[Outfit](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9204-new-outfit-two-islands/ "New: Outfit – Two Islands")** finally have a video for their debut single on [Double Denim Records](http://www.doubledenimrecords.com/), **_[Two Islands](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9204-new-outfit-two-islands/ "New: Outfit – Two Islands")_**, a track that was released all the way back in September. Built up of layered ‘moving portraits’, the video is a candid and at times chilling introduction to a selection of humans.

Like the track, it simmers with a brooding energy then breaks dramatically with a sobering and aching level of clarity.

###### Outfit play London’s Cargo on the 29th of November.
